headline: Wells Fargo Lifts PT on D.R. Horton (DHI) to $190 From $175
summary: D.R. Horton, Inc. (NYSE:DHI) is one of the best cheap stocks to buy for beginners. Wells Fargo analyst Sam Reid raised the firm’s price target on D.R. Horton, Inc. (NYSE:DHI) to $190 from $175 on September 2, keeping an Overweight rating on the shares. The firm told investors that it adjusted price targets in the […]
